description:
A rainy day at the zoo leads Panda and his fellow animals to think of creative ways to pass the time. Panda is still worried that Mr. Handa does not have a girlfriend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda, Tired of Boredom / Panda`s Advice Room for Troubles
Panda-kun, Hima ni Komaru / Panda no Nayami Soudan Shitsu
パンダくん, ヒマに困る / パンダの悩み相談室
